title: Taliyah Dev Podcast

embed.description: This week, designer Daniel "ZenonTheStoic" Klein, writer Ariel "Thermal Kitten" Lawrence, and character artist Willem "Tokkelossie" Van Der Schyf share the behind-the-scenes story on creating the Stoneweaver.

body:
Hi all,
For some insight into the development of Taliyah, and how we work on Champs in general, have a listen to the latest Dev podcast featuring game designer, Daniel “ZenonTheStoic” Klein, character artist Willem “Tokkelossie” Van Der Schyf, and Narrative writer Ariel “Thermal Kitten” Lawrence.

replies.body: Please have Zenon again soon! I could listen to him talk for years
I like the effort Jaredan. It shows alot. Keeps a good relation with the fans.
I'd love to see that terrain destruction ability spoken about at 47 minutes on an item. Possibly ohmwrecker since that poor item still exists.
very nice. keep up the good work ^^
